documents.document: This turned up this morning. https://t.co/mpEQNbabnW

Looks like @0rangelic and Alexa are having a misunderstanding about the shopping list this morning... https://t.co/uvZgNJeLAi

"it was just a one off script” said someone in reply to some feedback I gave.
Silly, “one off” scripts seldom are.
RT @crisvector: And finally, the posters of the Parts 17 and 18 (finale) of #TwinPeaks @SHO_TwinPeaks @TPeaksBrasil @Kyle_MacLachlan @DAVID…

I get that security is hard but... To do things this badly takes actual deliberate effort, surely?
https://t.co/ZDIqp8IvE5
Apparently the #TwinPeaks theme makes a most excellent rock track! https://t.co/F1mgZd5xKM
Sudden urge to play Kerbal Space Program…. https://t.co/0MeIbzpGg7
Time to update my favourite portable OS/editor because security... https://t.co/hqgFxvFoqm
@pedantic_git Naa. Like every good cliffhanger, it’s…. “What year is it?"
@borngeek Not sure at the moment. I do love software development, although a slight change of course has some appeal. :)
After 21 years of loyal service, software company I work for have decided they don't want an in-house developer any more. Job hunt begins.
@borngeek @0rangelic You won't regret it. Well, you might, but I guess that's part of the reason for watching. 😀
There seems to be a #TwinPeaks themed specular map applied to our floor @0rangelic https://t.co/Pf6D94kxuv
RT @MarshallJulius: Burn the land and boil the sea - you can't take this stroller from me. #Firefly #Serenity https://t.co/a9yGU1m6d9
@spodzone This application is very not-web-friendly though (for good and valid reasons). Which is what makes this all the more worrying.
@spodzone Last I looked swagger wasn't good with monolithic client-side Win32 applications with file/socket connections though. Unless I missed?
@spodzone Oh, it's an API alright. Just one that's so old even they can't remember how it works when re-writing it. ;)
@spodzone Wouldn't really help out here I'm afraid. (although I've used it elsewhere). This is good old file swapping in the file system.

PPS: This software is VERY MUCH ABOUT NEEDING TO BE SECURE AND STUFF.
(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻
…it handles badly malformed input (vs well malformed input) by getting responses out of sync.
…a non-error reply back when the next successful event happens in the software, even if no request was sent. So, actually, these days...
PS: When I said nothing comes back from badly malformed input, that wasn’t quite true. It’s much worse. Rather than error back it sends...
Let that sink in for a moment. They’ve improved the software by having it only handle WELL FORMED MALFORMED INPUT. https://t.co/XLTJsRC4zO
…interesting. Apparently my malformed input is too malformed. To get an error I need a well-formed malformed input.
This has always worked and worked well. Until now. Now… nothing comes back. Nothing at all. So I get onto their tech people. The reply is...
I send a (on purpose) malformed file to it and look for an error in reply. No error within a timeout period means it can’t be running.
This time too. My software has always done an up-front check to make sure that the 3rd party software is there. I use simple method.
Anyway, they change things once every $BIGNUM years and I need to handle that. I almost always find some odd bug when I do this.
*Our* software is old and uses an old method of communicating with theirs: they pass text files between each other. I know, I know...
Okay, I can’t be arsed to blog, so I’l do one of those twitter thread things. This is about some third-party software I’m working with...
I might be documenting my frustration with a third party supplier in our company’s issue tracker. https://t.co/TgfvhijvzE
Sensible idea is sensible. https://t.co/6fn6zRSOGc
RT @DaveLeeBBC: Superb: the BBC's Pidgin service has done a turn on the date poo story https://t.co/wH22wK9vM3
I just backed It's Magit! The magical Git client on @Kickstarter https://t.co/1o8ENnRlfw
@katebevan “poe from the real”*
@katebevan Holy fuck. I’m struggling to tell Poe from the amongst that. (also struggling to not get angry, as step-dad-to-be to someone on spectrum).
@JayPhonomancer Kinda epic. On the other hand I do wonder how amazing it must have been to wait 25 or so years.
I'm kind of torn. I've only had it in my life for about 4 weeks. I'm hungry for more! She hooked me and now the supply has run dry! https://t.co/ZtmtfqUjqN
@katebevan @ReneMillman Not the one in the image though, not really my style. I prefer something a bit more black. ;)
@katebevan As batshit as it all is…. blokes wearing skirts is a bad thing and is caused by prescription drugs? The fuck? O_o
RT @IanDunt: So sick of ppl not feeling comfortable in my country. Sick of xenophobes who made them feel this way and the politicians who p…
Recovering with @0rangelic this morning. Still baffled by what I watched last night. Still glad she got me into #TwinPeaks https://t.co/DFHrx4cvQg
@JayPhonomancer @0rangelic @irnbru Hell yes. Seeing "our" Coop have other Coop moments was... Unsettling.
Happy birthday @0rangelic. Thank you for messing up my life with #TwinPeaks. Xxx
@JayPhonomancer @0rangelic @irnbru Exactly that. I hate that. And I'd want nothing different either. I'm so confused.
RT @0rangelic: Hard to find words to express how much I have loved #TwinPeaks2017. Feeling a bit overwhelmed.
@JayPhonomancer @0rangelic @irnbru Yes. I really needed to know her story.
Seriously. I'm less frustrated as a Firefly fan than I am as a (new) #TwinPeaks fan. Which is actually awesome.
@JamesGHBray Holy hell was I ever!
@JayPhonomancer @0rangelic @irnbru I am so annoyed and outraged. And I bloody love it.
Well fuck. #TwinPeaks
Final 15 minutes to go of #TwinPeaks. @0rangelic on a loo break. Out of wine. Now on @irnbru and vodka. Nothing makes sense. Which is nice.
Episode 17 of #TwinPeaks done. Holy shit. They could have ended there. What the hell does 18 even contain?
Hold my coffee, I'm going in... #TwinPeaks https://t.co/wuSAVSimD1
@pedantic_git Even Google Now is a risk. It knows me too well (well, correct values of well, but isn't smart enough to learn not to spoil).
@pedantic_git I've seen quite a few potential spoilers in the past couple of weeks (since I caught up). Really don't want to spoil tonight.
Today is "avoid the Internet so the end of #TwinPeaks isn't spoiled" day. This is going to be a nightmare. Sent this without reading twitter
Might be re-watching #TwinPeaks episode 8 after one wine too many.
